body_html: @ezyang for most of the points you raise, I unfortunately don't know the full provenance of the hacks, and can't provide explanations. I'm merely eliminating all import-time code-sedding, as a first-class goal. @soumith or someone else may be able to chime in on why each of these hacks exist, in which case I'm happy to write it down.
